ARTICLE.TITLE: 2nd MNREGA fraud chargesheet against engineer
ARTICLE.TEXT: Ranchi: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) on Friday filed a supplementary chargesheet before the special court against erstwhile junior engineer Ram Binod Prasad Sinha, accused of corruption in MGNREGA schemes in Khunti district . Sources said that the chargesheet has details of further investigations in the case and the attachment of properties associated with the accused.Sinha is accused of abusing his official position to embezzle around Rs 18 crore from the allocations made to implement MGNREGA schemes in Khunti district. The anti-corruption bureau had registered 16 FIRs against Sinha under various sections of IPC and the Prevention of Corruption Act in this connection.The ED has also initiated investigation under Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) and attached moveable and immoveable properties worth Rs 4.28 crore through two orders. Meanwhile, the ED also filed a complaint before the PMLA court following which summon was issued to Sinha for appearance. Sinha failed to appear in court and was eventually arrested in Kolkata on June 22.
